item.title: Spike Lee Walks Back Comment That ‘Highest 2 Lowest’ Will Be His Last Film With Denzel Washington: “I Got My Mind Right”
item.description: The filmmaker had previously said that the pair would finish with five team-ups, but now says this may not be “the last film of the dynamic duo, D and Lee.”

item.title: Spike Lee Walks Back Comment That ‘Highest 2 Lowest’ Will Be His Last Film With Denzel Washington: “I Got My Mind Right”
item.description: The filmmaker had previously said that the pair would finish with five team-ups, but now says this may not be “the last film of the dynamic duo, D and Lee.”

item.title: Official ‘Highest 2 Lowest’ Trailer Features Denzel Washington in Tense Calls With Kidnapper
item.description: Spike Lee’s version of Akira Kurosawa’s ‘High and Low,’ which also stars A$AP Rocky, is set to hit theaters on Aug. 15 ahead of a Sept. 5 streaming debut.
